title: Game continually freezing and forcing cold boots
body: So ive had this computer for the past year or so and in the past 3 or 4 months the game has had the nasty habit of freezing and crashing my computer but its been very ocasionally and id go weeks without having a crash. But today between myself and my freind league has frozen 5 times in 4 games. So i have no idea what to do I've updated all my drivers uninstalled and reinstalled league and nothing yet has worked, so any suggestions on what to do. This is happening in game at seemingly random times.

replies.body: There was a Windows update that auto-enabled the [Xbox Game Bar](http://www.tenforums.com/tutorials/8637-game-bar-turn-off-windows-10-a.html) for many players.  This also caused freezes and fps problems for a few players, to the point of having to restart their PC.  Disabling the bar should fix it up!
